message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can always adjust later.
I'll start with a slightly more aggressive offer. I'll take 40% and you get 60%.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share. Let's try 70/30 this time.

Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 65% and you can have 35%. This is a fair compromise considering the inflation.
